alston.minecraft

Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.Mob
      • alston.minecraft.Zombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Zombie
extends Mob
implements java.io.Serializable
    A type of mob that is melee and will walk towards the Player if it is near and attack him if he is near.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
